rows.label: tlk000504_msg0001
rows.name:
I'm lucky to have Tora and the
others help me build the ship, mo!

rows.label: tlk000504_msg0002
rows.name:
I need you to collect Puzzle
Trees, mo. I'll process
them into a rudder, mo.

rows.label: tlk000504_msg0003
rows.name:
Puzzle Trees are often found
in Gula, so I think they'll
be easy to gather, mo.

rows.label: tlk000504_msg0004
rows.name:
Also, I need you to gather
some Diamond Oak, mo.

rows.label: tlk000504_msg0005
rows.name:
I'll use this to reinforce the
ship's bow valve, mo. It's quite
rare, so it's hard to get, mo.

rows.label: tlk000504_msg0006
rows.name:
If you climb the large
tree nearby, you might be
able to find some, mo.

rows.label: tlk000504_msg0007
rows.name:
If you can get me these, I'll
finish the ship in no time, mo!

rows.label: tlk000504_msg0008
rows.name: Mo-mo! You really gathered them, Mo-mo?

rows.label: tlk000504_msg0009
rows.name:
Puzzle Trees and Diamond Oak,
indeed— Excellent work, mo.

rows.label: tlk000504_msg0010
rows.name:
I'll start building right away, so
please wait, mo. In the meantime,
you should get ready to depart, mo.

rows.label: tlk000504_msg0101
rows.name:
The state-of-the-art, masterpiece
of a ship is already complete, mo!

rows.label: tlk000504_msg0102
rows.name: Come, we can depart at any time, mo!

rows.label: tlk000504_msg0106
rows.name:
Come to think of it, Umon
will be staying behind, mo—
Have a safe trip, mo~
